dcterms:creator: Ellen M. Voorhees
Donna Harman
dcterms:description: The TREC-8 ad hoc collection was constructed using deep pools over a diverse set of runs, including several effective manual runs. It contains approximately 525,000 full-text documents and 50 topics, with a total of 86,830 judged documents.
dcterms:title: TREC-8 ad hoc collection

dcterms:creator: Zeynep Akkalyoncu Yilmaz
Wei Yang
Haotian Zhang
Jimmy Lin
dcterms:description: MS MARCO (V1) passage data is used for training neural retrieval models. It provides a large set of passages for document retrieval tasks.
dcterms:title: MS MARCO (V1) passage data

dcterms:creator: Nandan Thakur
Nils Reimers
Andreas Rücklé
Abhishek Srivastava
Iryna Gurevych
dcterms:description: BIER is a heterogeneous benchmark for zero-shot evaluation of information retrieval models, providing a diverse set of datasets for testing retrieval systems.
dcterms:title: BIER

dcterms:creator: Emine Yilmaz
Nick Craswell
Bhaskar Mitra
Daniel Campos
dcterms:description: The TREC Common Core track was initiated to evaluate newer retrieval models and to create additional ad hoc collections that could be used for testing.
dcterms:title: TREC Common Core track

dcterms:creator: Ellen M. Voorhees
Donna Harman
dcterms:description: The TREC-6 and TREC-7 ad hoc collections were constructed to evaluate information retrieval systems and are part of the TREC series of test collections.
dcterms:title: TREC-6 and TREC-7 ad hoc collections
